description_for_model: This tool can search a personal movie wishlist. Use it to check if specific movies are on the list and whether they have been marked as 'watched'.

tools.name: search_movies
tools.description: Searches the movie wishlist for a specific movie title to see if it exists and what its status is (watched or unwatched).

query.description: The title of the movie to search for. E.g., 'Inception', 'The Godfather'.
